title: Sandberg’s Legacy Is an Internet of Targeted, Automated Ads
itunes:title: Sandberg’s Legacy Is an Internet of Targeted, Automated Ads
description:
Daron Acemoglu, Professor of Economics at MIT, explains how automation has impacted workers at the Port of Los Angeles. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Features Editor Max Chafkin share the details of Max's Businessweek Magazine story Sheryl Sandberg Entrenched Facebook, Google Ad Dominance. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Retail Staples & Packaged Food Analyst Jennifer Bartashus talks about Target shares sinking after the retailer cut its profit outlook for the second time in three weeks. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
